channel.title: Social Networking on Rukshan's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Social Networking on Rukshan's Blog

item.title: The good, the bad and the ugly side of Clubhouse
item.description: Today I complete my first week in clubhouse, the audio only social network, which according to some the hottest startup currently available on the internet, while Facebook, Twitter trying to copy the idea and incorporate it on to their own social networks.
